text: SPE Strovolos Nicosia, also known as A.S.S. Spes is a cypriot handball team located in Nicosia. They compete in the Cyprus National Handball League. == Titles == *Cyprus National Handball League **Winner (19): 1990, 1991, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2014 *Cyprus Cup **Winner (18): 1991, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012 ==European record == {| class="wikitable" !
